root.name: Battle Stadium D.O.N
root.description: OverviewThe game is much in the style of Super Smash Bros., but more in common with Jump Super Stars due to the existence of Life bars. The Life Bars, however are quite literally a game of tug of war because as one player damages the other, the health that is lost is gained by the other player. As a result, matches can last indefinitely long.

similar_games.game: One Piece Grand Battle: Swan Colosseum
